background_description: The background consists of a shallow aquatic environment with a seabed covered in fine light-colored sediment (likely sand or fine gravel) interspersed with patches of vibrant green algae or moss. Scattered small debris like twigs are also visible.
explanation: Two distinct orange and white goldfish are clearly visible against a contrasting seabed with green algae and light sediment, indicating a complete absence of camouflage. Their bright coloration stands out significantly from the environment.
